flexibility.title: Flexibility in Planning and Teaching
flexibility.s1: Set aside 15 minutes whenever it suits you and start building a more confident, joyful sex life‚Äîcompletely at your own pace.
flexibility.s2: Animated micro-classes, quick quizzes and an interactive AI coach turn knowledge into an engaging, hands-on experience.
flexibility.s3: Psychologists, sex therapists, gynecologists and urologists‚Äîeach with 5 + years of clinical practice‚Äîstand behind every lesson.
flexibility.s4: Step-by-step, theme-based modules show you exactly how to deepen intimacy and reach your personal or relationship goals.

soon.title: We're launching soon!
soon.sub: Join the waitlist and be the first to know when our courses become available.
soon.bold: Lustiq Lab is a new sexual education platform where experts help you explore and deepen your intimacy. We're launching soon!
soon.button: Want early access? Join the waitlist and get exclusive insights and special offers!

soon1.title: Lustig is revolutionizing sexual health and intimacy.
soon1.sub: Our unique therapeutic and educational platform allows anyone to begin their journey of sexual self-discovery with the help of an AI-powered therapist ‚Äî and transition to a real human expert when needed.
soon1.bold: Our mission is to provide personalized, discreet, and expert-guided support for sexual health and relationship well-being.
soon1.italic: ‚ÄúOur AI coach is trained in collaboration with sexologists, ensuring fast, science-based, and professionally sound answers. Anyone can ask anonymously about any sexual issue ‚Äî without judgment.‚Äù

soon2.title: We believe that sexuality can be learned...
soon2.sub: ...that understanding pleasure, desire, and intimacy is a skill ‚Äî one that can be developed with the right safe space and trustworthy knowledge.
soon2.sub2: We also know that when someone has a fulfilling sex life, it doesn‚Äôt just benefit their relationship ‚Äî it boosts their confidence, quality of life, and mental well-being too.
soon2.bold: For us, personal growth naturally includes sexual development.

soonEventsSection.title: Why is a new approach needed?
soonEventsSection.sub: Sexuality is often surrounded by outdated, incomplete, or taboo knowledge. We believe true sexual well-being begins with honest conversations, expert knowledge, and real support. These points highlight why the old system doesn't work ‚Äî and why we created this platform.

points.1: When our sexual health is off, it can lead to anxiety, tension, and loss of connection in our relationships.
points.2: Talking openly about sex is still hard ‚Äî taboos, misunderstandings, and narrow perspectives (often only heteronormative) dominate the discourse.
points.3: Many struggle with pressure to perform, lack of desire, or emotional disconnection ‚Äî yet few feel safe asking for help.
points.4: Traditional sex education is often dry, outdated, or simply inaccessible.
points.5: There's no modern, personalized, and holistic solution that truly blends science, psychology, and technology ‚Äî until now.

contact.title: Get in Touch with Us
contact.sub: Contact us using the information below.
contact.faq_sub1: We have collected the most frequently asked questions

about.1_d: Lustiq-Lab was created to provide credible knowledge about sexuality ‚Äì without taboos, based on science, and in an inspiring format. We believe that sexual well-being is not a luxury, but a fundamental human need: when we are in harmony with our own intimacy, our relationships become more balanced, our self-confidence grows stronger, and both our mental and physical health improve.
about.2_sub_1_d: Even as adults, many people only dare to ask questions in whispers, while the information they find is often inaccurate or rooted in shame.
about.2_sub_2_d: You have to seek out doctors, psychologists, and trainers separately to get truly comprehensive answers ‚Äì and even then, practical support is rare.
about.2_sub_3_d: We want fast, digital, and personalized support that fits seamlessly into our everyday lives.
about.3_sub_1: Expert video courses ‚Äì created by psychologists, doctors, sex therapists, intimate fitness trainers, and dietitians, in easy-to-digest 15-minute modules.
about.3_sub_2: AI coach ‚Äì a voice and chat-based anonymous practice space that gives instant feedback in communication or intimacy scenarios.
about.3_sub_3: Interactive tasks & quizzes ‚Äì so that the knowledge isn‚Äôt just heard, but truly integrated.
about.3_sub_4: Holistic product line ‚Äì libido-enhancing drops and Bond-Bites chocolate, supporting physical development with natural ingredients.
about.4_sub_1_d: All our content is created with top-level professionals.
about.4_sub_2_d: We speak honestly about sensitive topics, because silence only deepens the problems.
about.4_sub_3_d: We speak to everyone, regardless of gender, orientation, age, or life situation.
about.4_sub_4_d: Sexuality shouldn't be about fixing flaws, but about discovering a powerful resource.
about.5_sub_3_d: PhD ‚Äì Sex Psychologist, Head of Content
about.6_d: By the end of 2024, we aim to offer a comprehensive course catalog covering all key sexual topics, in four languages, with global reach. Our goal is to make Lustiq-Lab the 'masterclass' of sexual education ‚Äì where knowledge, technology, and joy come together.
about.7_d_2: Join our waitlist and be among the first to access the full Lustiq-Lab experience.

courses.author: Author
courses.aisub: This conversation is anonymous and confidential: we do not store any of your data. Here, you can freely ask the questions you've never dared to ask ‚Äì or practice the techniques you've learned before using them in real life. Try it now!

pricing.sub: Choose the subscription plan that suits you best.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.sub: We have collected the most common questions
faq.q1: How Do I Select a Course?
faq.a1: Browse our course catalog and choose the one that best fits your needs.
faq.q2: How Do I Access My Course?
faq.a2: After registration, you can access your course through your dashboard.
faq.q3: Do I Receive Anything After I Complete a Course?
faq.a3: Yes, you will receive a certificate of completion.
faq.a4: You can register anytime before the course start date.
faq.a5: You study at your own pace using our online materials and resources.
faq.q6: Can I Take More Than One Course at a Time?
faq.a6: Yes, you can enroll in multiple courses simultaneously.
faq.q7: Where can I go for help?
faq.a7: You can contact our support team or check our help center.
faq.q8: Can I talk to the professionals in person?
faq.a8: Please contact support for specific information about this topic.

introVideo.title: Who is it for?
introVideo.g1sub: If you've never had access to reliable sex education, you can start here safely.
introVideo.g2sub: Want to rekindle the spark, improve communication, and bring more joy into your relationship? Our practical courses can help.
introVideo.g3sub: If you've already read or studied, but are looking for specific techniques and routines ‚Äî you'll find them here, with voice-based AI support.
introVideo.g4sub: Professionals and dedicated learners who want to support others ‚Äî or already do ‚Äî in this field.

coursesBanner.title: Our Courses
coursesBanner.sub: Online courses by experts ‚Äì without taboos

testimonialsSection.sectionTitle1: Learning about intimacy, body awareness, and desires can be a liberating experience. Sexuality is a natural part of life, yet it's often surrounded by taboos. We want to change that with knowledge and empathy.
testimonialsSection.sectionSub1: More than information ‚Äì this is a safe space where questions are welcome. We help you navigate the world of feelings, relationships, and boundaries.
testimonialsSection.sectionTitle2: Everyone deserves joyful and consensual sexual experiences. That requires reliable information, openness, and self-awareness ‚Äì exactly what our platform supports.
testimonialsSection.sectionSub2: Sexuality is not just biology ‚Äì it's also about society, emotions, and culture. We talk about all of these openly.
testimonialsSection.sectionTitle3: Many missed out on proper sex education in school ‚Äì or were taught based on myths. Here's a chance to rebuild your knowledge and gain confidence in these topics.
testimonialsSection.sectionSub3: Our goal is to support everyone to grow at their own pace and without shame ‚Äì whether it‚Äôs about relationships, identity, or pleasure.
